description: General provisions related to the procurement process, including sourcing, purchasing, and supply chain management.
Provisions related to the administration, monitoring, and enforcement of contracts.
Provisions outlining the process and criteria for formal acceptance of goods, services, or deliverables under a contract.
Provisions outlining the process for resolving conflicts or disagreements arising from the contract, including negotiation, mediation, arbitration, and litigation.
Provisions regarding the protection and non-disclosure of sensitive or proprietary information.
Provisions related to adherence to environmental laws, regulations, and standards, including restrictions on hazardous substances, recycling requirements, and waste disposal.
Provisions addressing unforeseen events or circumstances beyond a party's control that may excuse or suspend performance of contractual obligations.
Provisions specifying the jurisdiction and laws that will govern the interpretation and enforcement of the contract.
Provisions that limit the amount or type of damages for which a party may be liable under the contract.
Provisions addressing liability and standards of care related to negligent acts or omissions.
Provisions outlining the terms, conditions, and requirements related to guarantees, including advance payment guarantees, performance bonds, and parent company guarantees.
Provisions outlining the obligation of one party to protect another party against losses, damages, or liabilities.
Provisions concerning the ownership, licensing, and protection of intellectual property rights, including patents, copyrights, trademarks, and trade secrets.
Provisions outlining pre-agreed sums payable in the event of a breach, typically related to delays or failure to meet service levels.
Provisions outlining the agreed-upon costs, fees, and payment terms for goods, services, or deliverables under a contract.
Provisions specifying the timing, method, and conditions of payment, including invoicing procedures, payment schedules, and late payment penalties.
Provisions addressing the allocation of tax liabilities and responsibilities between the parties, including value-added tax (VAT), sales tax, withholding tax, and other applicable taxes.
Provisions detailing the conditions, procedures, and consequences of contract termination, including termination for cause, convenience, or other specified events.
